Parent Perspective: What's one rule you'd definitely enforce as a parent?
What tradition would you pass down to your kids?
Would you rather be the cool parent or the strict parent?
When did you move in together?
Did you marry? If so, how was the proposal, wedding, and honeymoon?
How would you describe your early dating?
Did you ever meet your partner's family?
How do you spend your time together? Do you share hobbies and interests?
Do you have a special piece of music or something you share together?
What attracted you to your partner?
What do you miss about them when you are apart?
Tell me about your significant other(s).
Did you have children with your partner?
How did you feel when you found out you were going to become a parent?
How did your relationship change when you had children?
How has your relationship with your children changed over the years?
Did you have any grandchildren? If so, what advice would you give them?
How would you describe each of your children when they were growing up, and what do they do now?
Child Perspective: What's the funniest excuse you gave to avoid chores?
What's one thing your parents never let you do that you really wanted?
What advice from your parents stuck with you the most?
Sibling Perspective: What's the funniest fight you had with a sibling?
If you and your sibling started a business, what would it be?
What secret did you and your sibling keep from your parents?
Grandparent Perspective: What do you enjoy most about being retired?
How did you adjust to retirement?
Why did you choose to retire?
What do you miss most about the old days?

Values & Culture: Which of our core values do you identify with the most?
Would you rather work alone or on a team?
What motivates you the most at work?
Challenges & Experiences: What was the biggest disappointment you've experienced at work?
What's the hardest project you've ever worked on?
Who's the best boss you've ever had, and why?

Never Have I Ever: Never have I ever eaten something off the floor.
Never have I ever texted the wrong person by mistake.
Never have I ever fallen asleep in a meeting.
Truth or Dare: Truth: What's the most embarrassing thing you've Googled?
Dare: Talk in an accent for the next 2 minutes.
Truth: Who here do you trust the most?
Would You Rather: Would you rather never use a spoon again or never use a fork again?
Would you rather always be 10 minutes late or 20 minutes early?
Would you rather give up social media or give up pizza?
Debate Sparks: Firearms yes or no? Pick a side
Weed should be legal, yes or no? Pick a side
Pineapple on pizza, yes or no? Pick a side
